name: Timelapse (itch) (DareDoge)
description:
A little experiment about engaging with others. Controls

Use wasd /arrows to move.

What can you do?

Whatever you want! 

There's no specific objective, you can interact with other cubes to see if something happens or just stay still and watch how the world moves around you.

Notes

-My first completed game using Unity, yay!!

-I wanted to keep it as simple as possible in order to experiment and try a bunch of different things while still learning how to properly use the engine.

-Tested in Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

-Doesn't work on mobile phone.

-Game can be completed in less than 3 minutes.
